T02D1945:70b-1: bhatt'a ka manydzu shr'i ya m'a ri p'u dza kra ma bidhi n'a ma /
T02D1945:70b-3: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1945:70b-4: bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1945:70b-5: shes rab snying rjer ldan zhing dad pa legs brtan dang //
T02D1945:70b-6: sangs rgyas snying po 'dod phyir gang zag dbang thob pas //
T02D1945:70b-7: bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i rim pa khong du chud byas nas //
T02D1945:70b-8: rje btsun rnams la btud de rgyud 'dis sbyang bar bya //
T02D1945:70b-9: bdag nyid dran pa gcig pa'i 'gro blor ldan //
T02D1945:70b-10: bdag med pa las bzlog cing 'byor pa gsum dag pas //
T02D1945:70b-11: bsnyen dang sgrub la rab tu mkhas byas te //
T02D1945:70b-12: nyin dang mtshan mo thams cad g-yeng med tshul gyis 'bad //
T02D1945:70b-13: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo rdo rje can bcas dang //
T02D1945:70b-14: dri med snying po mthar mdzad bla ma rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1945:70b-15: dgra las rgyal ba gshin rje gshed nag lha yi tshogs //
T02D1945:70b-16: thugs rjes thugs chud spyan ras nyid 'tsho dgongs su gsol //
T02D1945:70b-17: chos sku longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul sku'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1945:70b-18: rgyal ba'i rang bzhin phung pos sems can re 'dod skong //
T02D1945:70b-19: 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pas nad gsos sman pa'i
T02D1945:70b-20: mchog / bla ma mgon po de la bdag ni
T02D1945:70b-21: phyag 'tshal lo // phung po lnga las rgyal zhing
T02D1945:70b-22: nyon mongs lnga rnams dag / rang gzhan don rdzogs
T02D1945:70b-23: gang zhig phag mo la sogs 'khril //
T02D1945:71a-0: ye shes rigs mtshungs lnga ldan rin chen lnga yi mdog / rnam mthar pha rol @71a * //
T02D1945:71a-1: phyin zhal phyag ldan khyod la 'dud //
T02D1945:71a-2: bdud bzhi las rgyal lta ba'i nges sgrol bcom nas kyang //
T02D1945:71a-3: dad sogs rnam dag khro bo'i rtags su nges 'byung ba //
T02D1945:71a-4: thabs kyis phyag rgyas sgrib pa thams cad mthar spangs pa'i //
T02D1945:71a-5: 'jigs shing rab gtum phyag mtshan rtags ldan phyag 'tshal bstod ;
T02D1945:71a-6: / sa chu me rlung 'byung ba bzhi ni rnam dag sku //
T02D1945:71a-7: byams dang snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms nyid //
T02D1945:71a-8: thabs dang smon lam ye shes rdzogs mdzad pa //
T02D1945:71a-9: tsartsi phag mo goo r'i'i dbyangs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1945:71a-10: mchod yon gdan mchog zhabs bkru ldan pa dang //
T02D1945:71a-11: spos dang me tog mar me zhal zas tshogs //
T02D1945:71a-12: rol mo'i sil snyan me tog phreng dang lnga ldi dang //
T02D1945:71a-13: mchod sdong bye bas brgyan pas rab tu mchod par bgyi //
T02D1945:71a-14: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs //
T02D1945:71a-15: du mar spyad kyang tshim pa med cing ngo mtshar ba //
T02D1945:71a-16: yid ldan sems kyis ngal bso khyad par gyur pa rnams //
T02D1945:71a-17: mos blo dad pa'i mthu yis bde gshegs 'khor lo mchod //
T02D1945:71a-18: 'khor lo rin chen rta dang glang po rab mtshan ldan //
T02D1945:71a-19: rgyal po btsun mo blon po mchog ni zhi zhing mdzes //
T02D1945:71a-20: 'byor ldan phun sum tshogs pa 'khor los sgyur ba yi //
T02D1945:71a-21: khyad par rdzas kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
T02D1945:71a-22: gdugs dang nyer ldan dung dang padmas rab tu mdzes //
T02D1945:71a-23: gundhe dpal be'u rgyal mtshan 'khor lo mdzes pa'i mchog
T02D1945:71a-24: /'jig rten dag na grags shing snyan par gang brjod
T02D1945:71a-25: pa'i // bla med rnams kyis bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
T02D1945:71a-26: dri chen rdo rje chur ldan byang chub sems dkar dmar dang bcas ;
T02D1945:71a-27: / mi sha rta dang ba lang glang chen khyi sha dang //
T02D1945:71a-28: sgron ma che dang ldan pas dur khrod mdzes byas pas //
T02D1945:71a-29: rnam par rtog bral bde gshegs 'khor lo dam pa mchod //
T02D1945:71a-30: bde gshegs khyed la ji snyed gnas pa'i yon tan ni //
T02D1945:71a-31: bdag gis bskal pa'i mtha' bar brjod pas mi lang bas//
T02D1945:71a-32: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nam mkha' tsam mos 'dis //
T02D1945:71a-33: rgyal ba gcig bzhin sangs rgyas 'khor lo thams cad bstod //
T02D1945:71a-34: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dug mang gis bskyed cing //
T02D1945:71a-35: lus ngag yid gsum sgo ru smin pa'i mi dge bcu //
T02D1945:71b-0: so so thar dang byang chub sems dang rig pa @71b 'dzin ;
T02D1945:71b-1: / tshul khrims sdom dang dam tshigs nyams pa ji snyed bshags //
T02D1945:71b-2: bdag gis bgyis dang de bzhin bgyid du stsal //
T02D1945:71b-3: nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i tshogs //
T02D1945:71b-4: slob dang mi slob sems kyis grogs su gang gyur pa //
T02D1945:71b-5: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dge la rjes yi rang ;
T02D1945:71b-6: / sangs rgyas zhing la bzhugs pa'i ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D1945:71b-7: gdul bya'i snang bar rab tu tshim mdzad khro dang zhi //
T02D1945:71b-8: 'gro ba mig ldongs shes rab sman gyis gsol ba'i phyir //
T02D1945:71b-9: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskor bar bskul //
T02D1945:71b-10: rgyal ba bcom ldan mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams //
T02D1945:71b-11: khyod mi bzhugs na 'jig rten 'di dag mgon med pas //
T02D1945:71b-12: nam mkhas gar khyab sems can ji srid mchis pa ru //
T02D1945:71b-13: de srid rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa bzhugs su gsol //
T02D1945:71b-14: bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi dge ba'i tshogs ji snyed //
T02D1945:71b-15: sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgoms pa nyid du ngas bsdus te //
T02D1945:71b-16: bdag gir bzung ba med cing sems can kun don du //
T02D1945:71b-17: dmigs pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo bar bgyi //
T02D1945:71b-18: bdag gis rje btsun rnams la shin tu dad sems kyis //
T02D1945:71b-19: sems can kun la phan phyir bsod nams ye shes tshogs //
T02D1945:71b-20: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gsum du bsdus byas te //
T02D1945:71b-21: dpal ldan bla ma rje btsun mchog gi zhabs drung
T02D1945:71b-22: shog / nyon mongs tshogs rnams dag cing sems rtogs
T02D1945:71b-23: nas // rgyal ba mgon po bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1945:71b-24: skur gyur shog / me tog shu kra len cing
T02D1945:71b-26: nyon mongs mngal du mi 'jug bde ba len par
T02D1945:71b-27: shog / yid ches sems kyis lhan cig skyes pa
T02D1945:71b-28: rnyed gyur te // 'byor pa'i nus pas rdo rje
T02D1945:71b-29: lta bu'i lus thob shog / chos rnams ro gcig
T02D1945:71b-30: bsam mi khyab kyi ro thob nas //
T02D1945:71b-31: rig dang tshogs kyi spyod pas sems can 'dul gyur
T02D1945:71b-32: cig / zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i phrin las
T02D1945:71b-33: nyer thob ste // gdug pa can rnams gshin rje
T02D1945:71b-34: gshed la mngon gzhol shog / thun mong dngos grub
T02D1945:71b-35: thogs pa med par thob nas kyang //
T02D1945:71b-36: blo stobs dman pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis 'tsho
T02D1945:71b-37: shog / nam mkha' dang mtshungs bde ba chen po'i
T02D1945:71b-38: sa thob nas // bdag dang sems can gshin rje
T02D1945:72a-0: gshed po nyid grub shog / sgrub po dad @72a
T02D1945:72a-1: sa thob nas // * // ldan lus ngag yid gsum rab sbyang phyir //
T02D1945:72a-2: rje btsun pa rnams mchod pa'i cho ga 'di byas pas //
T02D1945:72a-3: nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa byang gyur te //
T02D1945:72a-4: rgyun chad med dang phun sum tshogs sku thob par
T02D1945:72a-5: shog /'gro ba thibs po nyon mongs lam la rab
T02D1945:72a-6: tu gzhol // sdig pa'i dba' klong 'khrug pa'i nang du rtag tu zhugs //
T02D1945:72a-7: rnam smin chu srin gdug pa can gyi khar zhugs nas //
T02D1945:72a-8: g-yeng bas ngal ba don med ma byed dge ba sbyongs //
T02D1945:72a-9: rje btsun 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
